feed.title: Category: Ffmpeg | The Place Where Wishes Come True

entry.title: Have FFmpeg Output Audio
entry.content: Of course the most straightforward way is to output PCM wrapped in WAV format. Things will go pretty well with pcm_s16le, pcm_s24le and pcm_s32le, but not with the unsigned, which I don’t know why.

entry.title: Downmixing 5.1 Surround Sound to Stereo
entry.content:
By far I think using FFmpeg is still the best way to do it. A command like this will finish the job:

ffmpeg -i INPUT -vn -ac 2 -acodec CODEC OUTPUT
